cart_confirm_message: Are you sure you want to place this order?
chat_welcome: Hello, I'm Dr. {name}. How can I help you today?
reply_greeting: Hi there! How are you feeling today? Feel free to share anything with me.
reply_morning: Good morning! Is there anything you'd like to talk about today?
reply_afternoon: Good afternoon! How can I assist you?
reply_evening: Good evening! How was your day?
reply_night: Good night! Feel free to share before you rest.
reply_thanks: You're welcome! I'm glad I could help.
reply_story: Of course! I'm here to listen.
reply_anxious: Feeling anxious is normal. Try to take a deep breath and relax.
reply_stress: Stress can come from many things. Take some time for yourself.
reply_sad: It's okay to feel sad. Please take care of yourself.
reply_sleep: Sleep issues are common. Try reducing screen time before bed.
reply_tired: You seem tired. Don't forget to rest and stay hydrated.
reply_angry: It's okay to feel angry. Take a moment to calm down first.
reply_lonely: Feeling lonely can be hard. Try reaching out to someone you trust.
reply_unwell: Not feeling well? Would you like to talk about it?
reply_default: I understand. Please tell me more so I can help.
about_doctor_desc: An experienced doctor in the field of {specialist}. Friendly, communicative, and trustworthy.
logout_message: Are you sure you want to logout?
clear_all_notifications_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete all notifications?
delete_notification_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this notification?
sertraline_desc: An antidepressant for anxiety and depressive disorders.
fluoxetine_desc: Improves mood and is used for major depressive disorder.
diazepam_desc: Reduces anxiety and is also used as a sedative.
lorazepam_desc: A sedative medication for panic attacks and insomnia.
haloperidol_desc: An antipsychotic used for schizophrenia and bipolar disorder.
olanzapine_desc: Stabilizes mood in patients with bipolar disorder and schizophrenia.
risperidone_desc: An antipsychotic for autism and bipolar disorder.
quetiapine_desc: Reduces delusions and stabilizes mood in bipolar patients.
clonazepam_desc: A sedative used for panic disorders and seizures.
escitalopram_desc: An SSRI used for depression and generalized anxiety disorder.
